bottlenecks: Food Court entrance during peak hours
flow_paths: Main pathways connecting Entry Gates to Halls
Routes to Food Court and Plaza
emergency_routes: Main pathways leading to Exit Gates
Access roads to First Aid and Ambulance
high_risk_areas: Entry/Exit Gates during arrival and departure
Areas with limited visibility and narrow pathways
map_analysis.venue_type: Large outdoor venue including conference halls, food areas, amphitheater, and outdoor spaces.
map_analysis.capacity_estimate: 5000-10000 (depending on the size of the amphitheater and event)
recommendations: Implement crowd control measures at entry/exit points (barriers, signage, staff).
Increase the number of staff at the food court and registration area.
Develop a clear evacuation plan with clearly marked routes.
Ensure adequate lighting in all areas, especially pathways.
Monitor crowd density in real-time using cameras and/or sensors.
Consider staggered entry/exit times to reduce congestion.
Provide clear and visible signage throughout the venue.
Ensure access for emergency vehicles is always maintained.
Train staff on crowd management and emergency procedures.
Consider the use of queue management systems at the food court and registration area.
Increase security presence in identified hotspots
Prepare for potential crowd control measures
🎯 Monitor bottleneck: Entry and Exit Gates
🎯 Monitor bottleneck: Narrow pathways between buildings
🎯 Monitor bottleneck: Food Court entrance during peak hours
